title: Cassiopeia's Miasma Invisable??
body:
Was playing a game against a Cassiopeia (She was using the **original skin**) and when she cast **the ability Miasma it appears  invisible**. You cant see were she lands the ability but walking over it will inflict the poison and slow. This bug needs to be fixed ASAP. 

~kK Lad

replies.body: This bug has been persistent for over a year (even before her changes) and I do not know how to replicate it but it happens quite seldom.
